title: Banana strawberry trifle
ingredients: ['10-12 sponge fingers', '3 tablespoons sherry', '1/2 sachet custard powder', '250ml milk, or as needed', '300g strawberries, hulled and sliced', '2 bananas, sliced', '4 tablespoons sherry', 'sugar (optional)', '200g cream', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'a few strawberries for decoration']
